words.source: H7121 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of קָרָא 'to call'; KJV 'called', ESV 'called', NASB 'called'

H175 conj. + prep. l- + proper name; KJV 'and Aaron', ESV 'and Aaron', NASB 'and Aaron'

H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H5493 conj. + Hiphil juss. 3ms of סוּר 'to turn aside, remove'; KJV 'that he may take away', ESV 'to take away', NASB 'that He remove'
H6854 art. + n.fp tsephardeyaʿ 'frog'; KJV 'the frogs', ESV 'the frogs', NASB 'the frogs'
H4480 prep. min 'from' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'from me', ESV 'from me', NASB 'from me'
H5971 conj. + prep. min + n.ms construct ʿam 'people' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'from my people', ESV 'from my people', NASB 'from my people'
H7971 conj. + Piel cohort. 1cs of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'I will let go', ESV 'I will let go', NASB 'I will let go'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
